name: The Devil's Grind
description:
A small satanic village is under attack by Heavenly forces! Mince-max your way to victory in this turn-based RPG by sacrificing villagers to feed their strength to the Dark Lord.

Created for Ludum Dare 43 by:

Arsi "Hakita" Patala

Robert "Projab" Raulus

Mikko "Miggo89" Tamper
